rules.label: ðŸ”´ High Utilization
rules.template: Your {{Facility}} with {{Lender_Type}} has a utilization rate of {{creditutilizationratio}}% â€“ well above the recommended threshold.
rules.recommendation: Credit utilization above 30% can signal financial stress to lenders. Aim to pay off balances early in the billing cycle, or request a credit limit increase if your income supports it.
rules.field_mapping: Calculate: (Total Outstanding Balance / Limit) * 100 | Apply only to CRDTCARD and OVRDRAFT

rules.label: ðŸŸ  Moderate Utilization
rules.template: Your {{Facility}} with {{Lender_Type}} shows {{creditutilizationratio}}% utilization, which is above ideal levels.
rules.recommendation: While not critical, utilization above 50% can impact your score. Try to keep balances below 30% of your limit for optimal credit health.
rules.field_mapping: For revolving credit only (Facility = CRDTCARD or OVRDRAFT)

rules.label: ðŸŸ  Missed Payments
rules.template: Your {{Facility}} shows recent payment issues (code {{payment_conduct_code}}) in the last 12 months.
rules.recommendation: Payment codes 1-2 indicate missed or late payments. Contact your lender immediately to bring the account current. Set up auto-debit to prevent future delays.
rules.field_mapping: Conduct of Account column (last 12 months) | Codes: 0=current, 1=1-30 days late, 2=31-60 days late

rules.label: ðŸŸ  Missed Payments
rules.template: Your {{Facility}} has serious delinquency (code {{payment_conduct_code}}) indicating 60+ days overdue.
rules.recommendation: Accounts 60+ days overdue severely damage your credit. Reach out to your lender immediately to negotiate a payment plan or restructuring.
rules.field_mapping: Code 3=61-90 days, 4=91-120 days, etc. | Take MAX code from 12-month history

rules.label: ðŸŸ¡ Frequent Applications
rules.template: You've applied for {{numapplicationslast12months}} credit facilities in the past year.
rules.recommendation: Each application triggers a hard inquiry, temporarily lowering your score. Space out applications and use pre-qualification tools when available.
rules.field_mapping: CCRIS Summary section > Credit Applications > Approved in past 12 months + Pending

rules.label: ðŸŸ¡ Pending Applications
rules.template: You have {{numpendingapplications}} credit applications still pending.
rules.recommendation: Multiple pending applications suggest credit shopping or desperation. Wait for current applications to complete before submitting new ones.
rules.field_mapping: CCRIS Summary section > Credit Applications > Pending

rules.label: ðŸŸ¡ High Decline Rate
rules.template: {{application_decline_rate}}% of your recent applications have been declined.
rules.recommendation: Frequent rejections hurt your score and suggest issues with your credit profile. Review your credit report, address problems, and wait 3-6 months before reapplying.
rules.field_mapping: Calculate: If both approved and pending data available, infer declined = total applied - (approved + pending)

rules.label: ðŸŸ£ Thin Credit File
rules.template: Your credit file shows only {{distinct_account_types}} type of account.
rules.recommendation: A diverse credit mix (cards, loans, mortgages) demonstrates responsible credit management. Consider adding different account types gradually.
rules.field_mapping: Count distinct Facility types | Types: OTLNFNCE, CRDTCARD, HSLNFNCE, PCPASCAR, OVRDRAFT, etc.

rules.label: ðŸŸ£ Thin Credit File
rules.template: Your credit file has no credit card history.
rules.recommendation: Credit cards, when used responsibly, help build credit history. Consider a secured card if you're starting out.
rules.field_mapping: Check if any row has Facility = 'CRDTCARD'

rules.label: ðŸŸ£ Thin Credit File
rules.template: Your credit file lacks installment loan history (auto, personal, housing loans).
rules.recommendation: Adding a small installment loan and repaying it consistently can help diversify your credit mix and strengthen your profile.
rules.field_mapping: Check for Facility = 'HSLNFNCE', 'PCPASCAR', 'OTLNFNCE' (excluding credit cards)

rules.label: âšª Short Credit History
rules.template: Your oldest account is only {{oldest_account_months}} months old.
rules.recommendation: Credit history length matters. Keep your oldest accounts open and active to build a stronger credit timeline.
rules.field_mapping: Find MIN(Date) from Loan Information section | Calculate: months_between(today, earliest_date)

rules.label: âšª Recent Enquiries
rules.template: You've made {{recent_enquiries}} credit enquiries in the last 30 days.
rules.recommendation: Multiple enquiries in a short period can lower your score. Limit applications and use pre-qualification tools to check eligibility without hard inquiries.
rules.field_mapping: If available in derivatives section, otherwise not in standard report

rules.label: âšª Trade Reference Issues
rules.template: You have RM {{trade_ref_amount_overdue}} overdue with trade references, with amounts in the {{aging_bucket}} aging bucket.
rules.recommendation: Trade reference defaults can block B2B transactions. Clear these immediately and request written confirmation of settlement from the creditor.
rules.field_mapping: Sum amounts in aging columns: 31-60 Days, 61-90 Days, 91-120 Days, 121-150 Days, 151-180 Days, >180 Days

rules.label: âšª Trade Reference Issues
rules.template: {{trade_ref_reminder_count}} reminder letter(s) sent by trade creditors.
rules.recommendation: Reminder letters indicate persistent payment issues. Settle these accounts immediately to prevent escalation to legal action.
rules.field_mapping: Section 4: Reminders / Letter of Demand for Payment

rules.label: âš« Legal Risk
rules.template: Active bankruptcy proceedings found: {{case_details}}.
rules.recommendation: Bankruptcy proceedings are the most severe credit event. Engage legal counsel immediately. This will remain on your report for years and severely restrict credit access.
rules.field_mapping: D1 section > Special Remark = 'BANKRUPTCY NOTICE ISSUED' or similar | Status != 'CASE FULLY SETTLED'

rules.label: âš« Legal Risk
rules.template: You have {{legal_cases_settled}} settled legal case(s) on record.
rules.recommendation: While settled, these cases remain on your report for up to 7 years. Ensure all documentation shows 'CASE FULLY SETTLED' and request updates if paid but not reflected.
rules.field_mapping: Count rows where Settlement = 'CASE FULLY SETTLED'

rules.label: âš« Legal Risk
rules.template: You have {{legal_cases_active}} active legal case(s): {{case_types}}.
rules.recommendation: Active legal cases (summons, civil suits) severely impact creditworthiness. Engage with legal counsel and creditors immediately to settle before judgment.
rules.field_mapping: Count rows where Settlement is empty or not 'CASE FULLY SETTLED' | Case Type column

rules.label: âš« Legal Risk
rules.template: You are a director of {{company_name}} which has winding-up proceedings.
rules.recommendation: Being a director of a company in winding-up affects your personal credit. This does not imply personal liability unless you are a guarantor, but address it with legal counsel.
rules.field_mapping: D4 section: Director of Company with Petition or Winding-Up Order Issued

rules.label: ðŸ”µ Lender Concentration
rules.template: You have {{accounts_per_lender}} accounts with {{lender_name}}.
rules.recommendation: Concentration with one lender increases risk if that relationship sours. Consider diversifying across multiple institutions.
rules.field_mapping: Group Loan Information by 'Lender Type' and count | Flag if any lender has >2 accounts

rules.label: ðŸ”µ Secured Debt Heavy
rules.template: {{secured_loan_ratio}}% of your debt is secured (property/vehicle collateral).
rules.recommendation: Heavy reliance on secured debt may limit future borrowing capacity. Balance with unsecured credit to show diverse credit management.
rules.field_mapping: Calculate: Sum(Outstanding where Col Type = 10 or 30) / Total Outstanding * 100

rules.label: ðŸŸ¢ Positive Pattern
rules.template: Your {{Facility}} shows excellent payment history with no missed payments in the last 12 months.
rules.recommendation: Outstanding! Consistent on-time payments are the foundation of good credit. Continue this pattern to maintain and improve your score.
rules.field_mapping: All 12 months in Conduct of Account show '0'

rules.label: ðŸŸ¢ Low Utilization
rules.template: Your {{Facility}} utilization of {{creditutilizationratio}}% is within the ideal range.
rules.recommendation: Excellent! Keeping utilization below 30% is a credit best practice and positively impacts your score.
rules.field_mapping: For revolving credit only | Mark as positive signal

rules.label: ðŸŸ¢ Long Credit History
rules.template: Your credit history spans {{oldest_account_years}} years, showing established credit experience.
rules.recommendation: A long credit history demonstrates stability and experience managing credit. This is a strong positive factor for lenders.
rules.field_mapping: Calculate years: oldest_account_months / 12

rules.label: ðŸŸ¢ Low Application Rate
rules.template: You've made {{numapplicationslast12months}} application(s) in the past year, showing selective credit use.
rules.recommendation: Applying for credit only when needed demonstrates financial discipline and planning.
rules.field_mapping: Credit Applications section
